title: Please stop your Donation Miners
body:
Hello, girls and boys, who help me with Monero mining. Currently Monero has switched to a new hashing algo and the current build of WinXMR which I used before doesn’t support it yet. So if you’re running it right now – please stop and wait for news from me. If it will be updated, I will make a special announcement. Until then the only possible way to donate is only

via traditional cryptocurrency transaction
. Thanks again for supporting the just cause!
